title: JavaScript Code Quiz
description: A timed, multiple choice JavaScript fundamentals quiz.

title: README Generator
description: Node.js app taking user input via the inquirer package and returning a formatted markdown README file.

title: Day Planner
description: A daily planner that stores events in color-coded time blocks.

title: Random Password Generator
description: Generate strong random passwords with this simple application.
altText: Webpage titled Password Generator with box containing string of random text characters

title: Employee Management System
description: Command line app prompts user questions about employees, roles and departments to interact with MySQL database.

title: Note Taker
description: Note-taking app using an Express.js back-end to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Search by city to display the current weather and 5-day forecast.

title: E-Commerce Back-End
description: Manage category, product, and tags data with an Express server and MySQL database.

title: Tech Talk
description: A full-stack, CMS-style micro blog site featuring user-authentication, MVC structure, and Handlebars.js templating.

title: Sound Art Smart
description: A visual questionnaire to discover artworks based on your interests.

title: Unified
description: A full-stack student services site featuring user-authentication, subscription polling, and AWS image uploading.

title: Stockscape
description: Gamified investing application testing users' skills as they build portfolios and compete for highest year-end earnings.
